qualitative.reasoning: Muthoot Finance is the market leader in the Indian gold loan sector with a strong brand heritage and high promoter holding (~73%), indicating significant skin in the game. The management has maintained a robust Capital Adequacy Ratio (~27%) well above regulatory requirements and has recently received credit rating upgrades (e.g., Fitch to BB+). Corporate governance is viewed positively with no major regulatory red flags, and the company demonstrates prudent lending practices even during sector-wide stress.
